
                            
                            <p> <br>  <br> 电费从中国移动APP打开-小福券-生活服务，APP比较清晰，链接进去的很乱 <br>  <br> 看了下不支持预存的地区只有广州佛山，大部分都支持预存 <br>  <br> 电费是最划算的，不然可以去商超买烟用也行，公众号也可以套，看了下60券要扣10，到手50，一年最少也能赚96 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084743hlnoonakuo74v51e.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084743hlnoonakuo74v51e.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084745a92z1vndr388rq2h.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084745a92z1vndr388rq2h.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084747rnnglbblrvnnn4mn.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084747rnnglbblrvnnn4mn.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084749mnl2s8ltvlmao5ol.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/084749mnl2s8ltvlmao5ol.jpg"> <br>  </p>
